metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1428 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: There exists an vulnerability causing an abort() to be called in gRPC. The following headers cause gRPC's C++ implementation to abort() when called via http2: te: x (x != trailers) :scheme: x (x != http, https) grpclb_client_stats: x (x == anything) On top of sending one of those headers, a later header must be sent that gets the total header size past 8KB. We recommend upgrading past git commit 2485fa94bd8a723e5c977d55a3ce10b301b437f8 or v1.53 and above.

criterions.comment: grpc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
